diff_act: 2.adjust temperature settings for the entire home

regen.absent_element: indication of when the scheduled or default time period ends
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user when the scheduled or default time period ends and the thermostat reverts to its default setting.

label: When a manual temperature setting ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: using the default setting after a manual temperature setting ends
